scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=production && bun run prebuild.ts && bun build --compile index.ts --outfile dist/wildpig
scripts.build-linux: export NODE_ENV=production && bun run prebuild.ts && bun build --compile index.ts --target=bun-linux-x64-musl --outfile dist/wildpig
scripts.docker:build: bun run build-linux && docker build -t wildpig .
